title: 382. How Goes the Behavior-Change Revolution?
description: An all-star team of behavioral scientists discovers that humans are stubborn (and lazy, and sometimes dumber than dogs). We also hear about binge drinking, humblebragging, and regrets. Recorded live in Philadelphia with guests including Richard Thaler, Angela Duckworth, Katy Milkman, and Tom Gilovich.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
